name: Hats and Hand Grenades
description:
Hats and Hand Grenades is a cover-based twin-stick shooter featuring multiplayer versus battles. Shoot guns, throw grenades, take cover, and steal hats in this pixelated party game!

At present there are five unique arenas with destructable environments. Play locally or through Steam Remote Play Together.

Kill the AI target to earn a point. Earn three points to win. If another player kills you, you go back to zero. Simple!

Note this game currently has no single player option and should be played with friends.
